trans-unit.source: Implements a serialization surrogate selector that allows one object to perform serialization and deserialization of another.
trans-unit.target: 实现允许一个对象来执行序列化和反序列化的另一个序列化代理项选择器。

trans-unit.source: Populates the provided <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 填充所提供<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>序列化对象所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: Extracts data from object `obj` and stores it in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从对象中提取数据`obj`和将其存储在<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info`参数。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: Having located the surrogate, this method stores information on the object `obj` in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在找到该代理项，此方法将信息存储在对象上`obj`中<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info`参数。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: This information describes its view of that object, including the object's fields, properties, and current values.
trans-unit.target: 此信息描述其视图的对象，包括对象的字段、 属性和当前值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> might correspond to the actual object, or it can be a synthesized view of the surrogate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>可能对应于实际的对象，也可以是该代理项的合成的视图。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: This method is protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法受<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>指定。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>要填充数据。

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 目标 (请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) 此序列化。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Populates the object using the information in the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 填充使用中的信息的对象<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SetObjectData method is called during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化过程中调用 SetObjectData 方法。

trans-unit.source: With this method, you can take the empty <xref:System.Object>`obj` that has already been created, and enter <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info` data into that object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法，您可以采取空<xref:System.Object>`obj`，已创建，并输入<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info`到该对象的数据。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo></xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Constructors are not invoked during deserialization of information and reconstruction of the object.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数不会在反序列化信息和重建对象期间调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法受<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>指定。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object to populate.
trans-unit.target: 要填充的对象。

trans-unit.source: The information to populate the object.
trans-unit.target: 要填充对象的信息。

trans-unit.source: The source from which the object is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 从其反序列化对象源。

trans-unit.source: The surrogate selector where the search for a compatible surrogate begins.
trans-unit.target: 开始执行搜索兼容的代理项的代理项选择器。

trans-unit.source: The populated deserialized object.
trans-unit.target: 填充的反序列化的对象。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。
